```{r setup, include=FALSE}
knitr::opts_chunk$set(echo = TRUE)
library(tidyverse)
library(dplyr)
library(gov.1005.data)
library(tidyr)
library(devtools)
```



```{r}
italian_polls %>% 
  filter(date >= "2016-11-01") %>% 
  select(date, firm, n, LN, PD, FIPDLFI, M5S, FdI, IdV) %>% 
  gather(key="party", value = "poll", LN, PD, FIPDLFI, M5S, FdI, IdV) %>% 
  ggplot(aes(x=date, y=poll, color=party)) +
  geom_line()


```
